title: why am i so bad at ranked and draft pick

embed.description: Epixragequit / Bronze 2 0LP / 2W 10L Win Ratio 17% / Blitzcrank - 1W 2L Win Ratio 33%, Warwick - 1W 2L Win Ratio 33%, Kha'Zix - 0W 2L Win Ratio 0%, Jhin - 0W 2L Win Ratio 0%, Shaco - 0W 1L Win Ratio 0%

replies.body: Bro don’t worry my win rate is worse then yours, dropped from Gold V to Silver IV 0 LP bc trash team mates flaming each other and feeding hard causing me to feed and I’m a jg main. You do get used to it but 80% of OCE players are Silver

Without watching a game, its super hard to tell whats wrong with your play, however going off your op.gg i'd say your problem is playing champions that are too complex. Now i've been bronze 5 before, so i can tell you as someone who has been down there and got out, you need to lock in basic champions so you can learn the basics of the role you are playing. This means no kha, shaco or azir, nothing more complex then a screwdriver (xin zhao and trundle, perhaps amumu/warwick for jungle, Garen/trundle for top, Annie mid). Put some normals into these basic champs, then once comfortable on them, bring them to ranked. From here, you can learn the basics, as you don't have to focus on any complex mechanics and at bronze level, most people do this very poorly (myself included sometimes), so these basics alone should get you climbing if you can do them well, as long as you stick to these basic champions.

the only champ i do decent with is brainless ww now
edit: and i havent got a win in 11 games
When you are jgling. You pve too much and dont ganks. Your dps is terrible.
so should i switch to being a adc main
